sentences.sContent: Kitchell says the city was a microcosm of all American culture during the '60s.
sentences.sCn: 基切尔说这个城市曾经是60年代所有美国文化的一个缩影。

synos.tran: [物]微观世界；小宇宙；作为宇宙缩影的人类；缩图（等于microcosmos）

remMethod.val: micro(微小的) + cosm(宇宙， 世界) → 微观世界

words.tran: 微观的，微观世界的；小宇宙的
缩微本；由缩影胶片复印的影本

trans.tranOther: a small group, society, or place that has the same qualities as a much larger one
